headline: Modern Love: The Podcast | Episode 5
text:
Welcome to the fifth episode of Modern Love: The Podcast, brought to you by The New York Times and WBUR. This week, you’ll hear the actress Dakota Fanning read a 2013 Modern Love essay by Natalie Lindeman titled “Celebrating the Upside of an Emotional Plunge,” about a teenager who finds the silver lining (and love) after falling 100 feet into one the country’s steepest canyons.

Afterward, the host Meghna Chakrabarti and the Modern Love editor Daniel Jones will catch up with Ms. Lindeman to hear what’s happened since her column ran.

Look for the “play” button below.

Read more Modern Love columns and hear the other podcast episodes here.
